## What is Mental Health First Aid: An Expert Interview with Dr. Sarah Johnson

Mental Health First Aid (MHFA) is an essential skill that can help individuals provide initial support to those experiencing mental health issues. To understand more about MHFA, we interviewed Dr. Sarah Johnson, a renowned psychologist and mental health expert. In this interview, Dr. Johnson explains the concept of MHFA, its importance, and how to apply it in various situations.
